import { useTheme } from "../../Context/Theme" import Button from "../Generic/Button" import Multislider from "../Generic/Multislider" import Paper from "../Generic/Paper" import Dropdown from "./Dropdown" import { useUser } from "../../Context/User" import Typography from "../Generic/Typography" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useSearchParams, history } from "react-router-dom" const Filters = () => { const user = useUser() const theme = useTheme() const [searchParams, setSearchParams] = useSearchParams() const { removeFavorite, toggleGenre, genres } = user const genresArr = [ 'Drama', 'Action', 'Crime', 'War', 'Animation', 'Comedy', 'Family', 'Thriller', 'Music', 'Romance', 'Adventure', 'Fantasy', 'Science Fiction', 'Horror', 'Mystery', ] const [input, setInput] = useState(searchParams.get('search') ? searchParams.get('search') : '') useEffect(() => { const genreParams = searchParams.get('genres') toggleGenre(genreParams && genreParams.split('/')) },[]) return (
{user.user.favorites.map((favorite, index) => ( <>
{favorite.title} {favorite.tagline.length > 100 ? `${favorite.tagline.substring(0, 100)}...` : favorite.tagline}
{(user.user.favorites.length > 1 && index !== user.user.favorites.length - 1) &&
} ))}
{setInput(e.target.value)}} type='text' style={{ backgroundColor: 'transparent', borderColor: theme.primary, borderWidth: '1px' }} className='pl-2 rounded-none rounded-l-full w-72' />
{genresArr.map((genre) => ( ))}
) } export default Filters
